verses.verse: Now Korah, <WH7141> the son <WH1121> of Izhar, <WH3324> the son <WH1121> of Kohath, <WH6955> the son <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> the sons <WH1121> of Eliab, <WH446> and On, <WH203> the son <WH1121> of Peleth, <WH6431> sons <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> took <WH3947> men:

And they rose up <WH6965> before <WH6440> Moses, <WH4872> with certain <WH376> of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> princes <WH5387> of the assembly, <WH5712> famous <WH7148> in the congregation, <WH4150> men <WH376> of renown: <WH8034>

And they gathered themselves together <WH6950> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Ye take too much <WH7227> upon you, seeing <WH3588> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> are holy, <WH6918> every one <WH3605> of them, and the LORD <WH3068> is among <WH8432> them: wherefore <WH4069> then lift ye up yourselves <WH5375> above <WH5921> the congregation <WH6951> of the LORD? <WH3068>
And when Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> it, he fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> his face: <WH6440>

And he spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Korah <WH7141> and unto <WH413> all <WH3605> his company, <WH5712> saying, <WH559> Even tomorrow <WH1242> the LORD <WH3068> will show <WH3045> <WH853> who <WH834> are his, and who is holy; <WH6918> and will cause him to come near <WH7126> unto <WH413> him: even him whom <WH834> he hath chosen <WH977> will he cause to come near <WH7126> unto <WH413> him.
This <WH2063> do; <WH6213> Take <WH3947> you censers, <WH4289> Korah, <WH7141> and all <WH3605> his company; <WH5712>

And put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein, and put <WH7760> incense <WH7004> in <WH5921> them before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> tomorrow: <WH4279> and it shall be <WH1961> that the man <WH376> whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> doth choose, <WH977> he <WH1931> shall be holy: <WH6918> ye take too much <WH7227> upon you, ye sons <WH1121> of Levi. <WH3878>
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Korah, <WH7141> Hear, <WH8085> I pray you, <WH4994> ye sons <WH1121> of Levi: <WH3878>

Seemeth it but a small thing <WH4592> unto <WH4480> you, that <WH3588> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> hath separated <WH914> you from the congregation <WH4480> <WH5712> of Israel, <WH3478> to bring you near <WH7126> <WH853> to <WH413> himself to do <WH5647> <WH853> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the LORD, <WH3068> and to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> to minister <WH8334> unto them?

And he hath brought thee near <WH7126> <WH853> to him, and all <WH3605> thy brethren <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> with <WH854> thee: and seek <WH1245> ye the priesthood <WH3550> also? <WH1571>

For which cause <WH3651> both thou <WH859> and all <WH3605> thy company <WH5712> are gathered together <WH3259> against <WH5921> the LORD: <WH3068> and what <WH4100> is Aaron, <WH175> that <WH3588> ye murmur <WH3885> against <WH5921> him?
And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to call <WH7121> Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> the sons <WH1121> of Eliab: <WH446> which said, <WH559> We will not <WH3808> come up: <WH5927>

Is it a small thing <WH4592> that <WH3588> thou hast brought us up <WH5927> out of a land <WH4480> <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> to kill <WH4191> us in the wilderness, <WH4057> except <WH3588> thou make thyself altogether a prince <WH8323> <WH8323> <WH1571> over <WH5921> us?

Moreover <WH637> thou hast not <WH3808> brought <WH935> us into <WH413> a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> or given <WH5414> us inheritance <WH5159> of fields <WH7704> and vineyards: <WH3754> wilt thou put out <WH5365> the eyes <WH5869> of these <WH1992> men? <WH376> we will not <WH3808> come up. <WH5927>

And Moses <WH4872> was very wroth, <WH2734> <WH3966> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> Respect <WH6437> <WH413> not <WH408> thou their offering: <WH4503> I have not <WH3808> taken <WH5375> one <WH259> ass <WH2543> from <WH4480> them, neither <WH3808> have I hurt <WH7489> <WH853> one <WH259> of <WH4480> them.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Korah, <WH7141> Be <WH1961> thou <WH859> and all <WH3605> thy company <WH5712> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> thou, <WH859> and they, <WH1992> and Aaron, <WH175> tomorrow: <WH4279>

And take <WH3947> every man <WH376> his censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> incense <WH7004> in <WH5921> them, and bring <WH7126> ye before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> every man <WH376> his censer, <WH4289> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> censers; <WH4289> thou <WH859> also, and Aaron, <WH175> each <WH376> of you his censer. <WH4289>

And they took <WH3947> every man <WH376> his censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> in <WH413> them, and laid <WH7760> incense <WH7004> thereon, <WH413> and stood <WH5975> in the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> with Moses <WH4872> and Aaron. <WH175>

And Korah <WH7141> gathered <WH6950> <WH853> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> against <WH5921> them unto <WH413> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> the congregation. <WH5712>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> and unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>
Separate yourselves <WH914> from among <WH4480> <WH8432> this <WH2063> congregation, <WH5712> that I may consume <WH3615> them in a moment. <WH7281>

And they fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> their faces, <WH6440> and said, <WH559> O God, <WH410> the God <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> shall one <WH259> man <WH376> sin, <WH2398> and wilt thou be wroth <WH7107> with <WH5921> all <WH3605> the congregation? <WH5712>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the congregation, <WH5712> saying, <WH559> Get you up <WH5927> from about <WH4480> <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korah, <WH7141> Dathan, <WH1885> and Abiram. <WH48>
And Moses <WH4872> rose up <WH6965> and went <WH1980> unto <WH413> Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram; <WH48> and the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> followed <WH1980> <WH310> him.

And he spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> the congregation, <WH5712> saying, <WH559> Depart, <WH5493> I pray you, <WH4994> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the tents <WH168> of these <WH428> wicked <WH7563> men, <WH376> and touch <WH5060> nothing <WH408> <WH3605> of theirs, lest <WH6435> ye be consumed <WH5595> in all <WH3605> their sins. <WH2403>

So they got up <WH5927> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korah, <WH7141> Dathan, <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> on every side: <WH4480> <WH5439> and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48> came out, <WH3318> and stood <WH5324> in the door <WH6607> of their tents, <WH168> and their wives, <WH802> and their sons, <WH1121> and their little children. <WH2945>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> Hereby <WH2063> ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath sent <WH7971> me to do <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> works; <WH4639> for <WH3588> I have not <WH3808> done them of mine own mind. <WH4480> <WH3820>

If <WH518> these <WH428> men die <WH4191> the common death <WH4194> of all <WH3605> men, <WH120> or if they be visited <WH6485> after <WH5921> the visitation <WH6486> of all <WH3605> men; <WH120> then the LORD <WH3068> hath not <WH3808> sent <WH7971> me.

But if <WH518> the LORD <WH3068> make <WH1254> a new thing, <WH1278> and the earth <WH127> open <WH6475> <WH853> her mouth, <WH6310> and swallow them up, <WH1104> <WH853> with all <WH3605> that <WH834> appertain unto them, and they go down <WH3381> quick <WH2416> into the pit; <WH7585> then ye shall understand <WH3045> that <WH3588> these <WH428> men <WH376> have provoked <WH5006> <WH853> the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as he had made an end <WH3615> of speaking <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words, <WH1697> that the ground <WH127> cleaved asunder <WH1234> that <WH834> was under <WH8478> them:

And the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> <WH853> her mouth, <WH6310> and swallowed them up, <WH1104> <WH853> and their houses, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> the men <WH120> that <WH834> appertained unto Korah, <WH7141> and all <WH3605> their goods. <WH7399>

They, <WH1992> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> appertained to them, went down <WH3381> alive <WH2416> into the pit, <WH7585> and the earth <WH776> closed <WH3680> upon <WH5921> them: and they perished <WH6> from among <WH4480> <WH8432> the congregation. <WH6951>

And all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> that <WH834> were round about <WH5439> them fled <WH5127> at the cry <WH6963> of them: for <WH3588> they said, <WH559> Lest <WH6435> the earth <WH776> swallow us up <WH1104> also.

And there came out <WH3318> a fire <WH784> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> and consumed <WH398> the <WH853> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> men <WH376> that offered <WH7126> incense. <WH7004>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH559> unto <WH413> Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> that he take up <WH7311> <WH853> the censers <WH4289> out of <WH4480> <WH996> the burning, <WH8316> and scatter <WH2219> thou the fire <WH784> yonder; <WH1973> for <WH3588> they are hallowed. <WH6942>

<WH853> The censers <WH4289> of these <WH428> sinners <WH2400> against their own souls, <WH5315> let them make <WH6213> <WH853> them broad <WH7555> plates <WH6341> for a covering <WH6826> of the altar: <WH4196> for <WH3588> they offered <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> therefore they are hallowed: <WH6942> and they shall be <WH1961> a sign <WH226> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> took <WH3947> <WH853> the brazen <WH5178> censers, <WH4289> wherewith <WH834> they that were burnt <WH8313> had offered; <WH7126> and they were made broad <WH7554> plates for a covering <WH6826> of the altar: <WH4196>

To be a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that <WH4616> <WH834> no <WH3808> stranger, <WH376> <WH2114> which <WH1931> is not <WH3808> of the seed <WH4480> <WH2233> of Aaron, <WH175> come near <WH7126> to offer <WH6999> incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> that he be <WH1961> not <WH3808> as Korah, <WH7141> and as his company: <WH5712> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> said <WH1696> to him by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>

But on the morrow <WH4480> <WH4283> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559> Ye <WH859> have killed <WH4191> <WH853> the people <WH5971> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when the congregation <WH5712> was gathered <WH6950> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> that they looked <WH6437> toward <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and, behold, <WH2009> the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it, and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared. <WH7200>
And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came <WH935> before <WH413> <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Get you up <WH7426> from among <WH4480> <WH8432> this <WH2063> congregation, <WH5712> that I may consume <WH3615> them as in a moment. <WH7281> And they fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> their faces. <WH6440>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> Take <WH3947> <WH853> a censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein <WH5921> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and put on <WH7760> incense, <WH7004> and go <WH1980> quickly <WH4120> unto <WH413> the congregation, <WH5712> and make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> them: for <WH3588> there is wrath <WH7110> gone out <WH3318> from <WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> the plague <WH5063> is begun. <WH2490>

And Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> as <WH834> Moses <WH4872> commanded, <WH1696> and ran <WH7323> into <WH413> the midst <WH8432> of the congregation; <WH6951> and, behold, <WH2009> the plague <WH5063> was begun <WH2490> among the people: <WH5971> and he put on <WH5414> <WH853> incense, <WH7004> and made an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> the people. <WH5971>
And he stood <WH5975> between <WH996> the dead <WH4191> and the living; <WH2416> and the plague <WH4046> was stayed. <WH6113>

Now they that died <WH4191> in the plague <WH4046> were <WH1961> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred, <WH3967> beside <WH4480> <WH905> them that died <WH4191> about <WH5921> the matter <WH1697> of Korah. <WH7141>
And Aaron <WH175> returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> unto <WH413> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and the plague <WH4046> was stayed. <WH6113>
